author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: We had submitted outcome for the board meeting held on 14th September, 2017, however on checking we came to know about clerical mistake in the share exchange ratio mentioned in the outcome of the Board Meeting submitted to you, we hereby submit revised and corrected outcome along with disclosure in respect of the aforesaid Scheme as required under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and
articleBody: We had submitted outcome for the board meeting held on 14th September, 2017, however on checking we came to know about clerical mistake in the share exchange ratio mentioned in the outcome of the Board Meeting submitted to you, we hereby submit revised and corrected outcome along with disclosure in respect of the aforesaid Scheme as required under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 are enclosed as Annexure 1Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: With reference to the above captioned subject, please find herewith the outcome of the meeting of the Board of Directors.
articleBody: With reference to the above captioned subject, please find herewith the outcome of the meeting of the Board of Directors of M/s. Rainbow Paper Limited held on 12th August, 2017, at the registered office of the company:    i. The Board of Directors has approved the Secretarial Audit Report for the financial year ended on 31st March, 2017 received from the Practicing Company Secretary.   ii. The Board of Directors has approved the draft of Directors' Report.  iii. Board Of Directors has reappointed Mr. Rahul Maheshwari,Executive Director for a term of 5 years ,subject to the approval of members in General Meeting.  iv. Board of Directors have decided to review conducting of 31st Annual General Meeting of the company and its venue at the later Board Meeting which is tentatively scheduled to be held in the end of this month.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'BSE Notices'}
headline: Rainbow Papers' board meeting on August 12, 2017
description: With reference to the above subject, we are pleased to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the company will be held on Saturday, 12th August, 2017, at the Registered Office of the Company situated at 801, Avdhesh House, Opp. Shri Guru Govind Gurudwara, Gandhinagar - Sarkhej Highway, Thaltej, Ahmedabad – 380 054.
articleBody: With reference to the above subject, we are pleased to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the company will be held on Saturday, 12th August, 2017, at the Registered Office of the Company situated at 801, Avdhesh House, Opp. Shri Guru Govind Gurudwara, Gandhinagar - Sarkhej Highway, Thaltej, Ahmedabad – 380 054, to consider the following matters:    Approval of the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended on 30th June, 2017.   To consider &amp; approve the Directors' Report and Corporate Governance Report for the financial year ended 31st March, 2017.   To consider &amp; approve the Secretarial Audit Report for the financial year ended 31st March, 2017.   To approve the notice for convening the 31st Annual General Meeting and decide date, time and venue for the same.    Any other matter with the permission of the Chair.Source : BSE

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on July 18, 2016, has finalized M/s. Link Intime India Pvt. Ltd., as Company's new Registrar &amp; Share Transfer Agent to take over the charge from M/s Sharepro Services (India) Pvt. Ltd.
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on July 18, 2016, has :- The Board has finalized M/s. Link Intime India Pvt. Ltd., as Company's new Registrar &amp; Share Transfer Agent to take over the charge from M/s Sharepro Services (India) Pvt. Ltd. in compliance with SEBI order dated March 22, 2016. The documentation for shifting of RTA Services is under process.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rainbow Papers at its meeting held on June 07, 2016, has authorized Shri Rajpal Singh, Authorised Person of the Company as Informant to file the reference with the Board for Industrial and Financial Reconstruction [BIFR] in Form 'A' as prescribed by Honourable BIFR.
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on June 07, 2016, inter alia, has authorized Shri Rajpal Singh, Authorised Person of the Company as Informant to file the reference with the Board for Industrial and Financial Reconstruction [BIFR] in Form 'A' as prescribed by Honourable BIFR.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rainbow Papers board meeting on June 07, 2016
description: Rainbow Papers' board meeting will be held on June 07, 2016, to consider &amp; approve the Directors' Report and Corporate Governance for the financial year ended March 31, 2016. To consider &amp; approve the Secretarial Audit Report for the financial year ended March 31, 2016.
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on June 07, 2016, inter alia, to consider the following matters:1. To consider &amp; approve the Directors' Report and Corporate Governance for the financial year ended March 31, 2016.2. To consider &amp; approve the Secretarial Audit Report for the financial year ended March 31, 2016.3. To approve the notice for convening the 30th Annual General Meeting and decide date, time and venue for the same.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting

Mehta Lodha &amp; Co., Chartered Accountants, as Statutory Auditors of the Company for the FY 2016-17.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on August 26, 2015, has approved the recommendation of appointment of M/s. Mehta Lodha &amp; Co., Chartered Accountants, Ahmedabad as Statutory Auditors of the Company
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on August 26, 2015, has considered the following:1. The Board of Directors as per the recommendation of Audit Committee has approved the recommendation of appointment of M/s. Mehta Lodha &amp; Co., Chartered Accountants, Ahmedabad as Statutory Auditors of the Company to fill the casual vacancy caused due to the resignation of M/s. Pary &amp; Co., Chartered Accountants, Ahmedabad, whose appointment was due for ratification at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.2. The Board of Directors has subject to necessary approval from the shareholders in General Meeting, decided to dilute the investment in Rainbow Papers JLT, Dubai, Wholly Owned Subsidiary (WOS) of Rainbow Papers Limited by way of sale or dilution of shareholding by raising capital in the said WOS.3. The Board of Directors have decided to revise the notice of the ensuing Annual General Meeting scheduled to be held on September 28, 2015 to consider the additional items as stated in para 1 &amp; 2 above.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rainbow Papers' board meeting on August 12, 2015
description: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on August 12, 2015, to consider, approve and take on record the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on June 30, 2015.
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on August 12, 2015, inter alia, to consider the following matters:1. To consider, approve and take on record the Un-audited Financial Results for the quarter ended on June 30, 2015.2. To approve the Directors' Report for the financial year ended March 31, 2015.3. To approve the Secretarial Audit Report for the financial year ended March 31, 2015.4. To approve the notice for convening the 29th Annual General Meeting and decide date, time and venue for the same.5. To consider the matter pertaining to issue Non Convertible Debentures (NCD), Bonds and other suitable financial instruments upto US&amp;#36; 250 Mn.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rainbow Papers has informed that Shri Mahendrabhai Mohanlal Patel, Director of the Company has, on account of his preoccupation, tendered his resignation from the post of Director of the Company and the same is accepted in the meeting of Board of Directors held on July 02, 2015.
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that Shri Mahendrabhai Mohanlal Patel, Director of the Company has, on account of his preoccupation, tendered his resignation from the post of Director of the Company and the same is accepted in the meeting of Board of Directors held on July 02, 2015.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rainbow Papers

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rainbow Papers: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rainbow Papers at its meeting held on October 21, 2013, has considered the board of directors has allotted 2,52,000 Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 2/- per share to one of the promoter group Company viz. M/s. Drupa Suppliers Pvt. Ltd., pursuant to the conversion of 2,52,000 warrants out of 90,00,000 warrants allotted to the said Company.
articleBody: Rainbow Papers Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on October 21, 2013, has considered the following :1. The Board of Directors has allotted 2,52,000 Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 2/- per share to one of the promoter group Company viz. M/s. Drupa Suppliers Pvt. Ltd., pursuant to the conversion of 2,52,000 warrants out of 90,00,000 warrants allotted to the said Company on December 20, 2012 on preferential basis under Chapter VII of SEBI (Issue of Capital and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2009.2. The Board of Directors has appointed Shri. Mahendra Patel as an Additional Director of the Company.3. Shri Rajendra Patawari has tendered his resignation from the post of Director.4. The Board has reconstituted the committees on account of change in composition of board. Shri.
